text:
To define some alias to call servlet,thess few lines work on Tomcat 3.1 but not 
on 3.2.1 (404):
<servlet>
  <servlet-name>
    ServletAlias
  </servlet-name>
  <servlet-class>
    foo.bar.some.package.name.that.is.very.long.TrueServletName
  </servlet_class>
</servlet>
<servlet-mapping>
  <servlet-name>
    ServletAlias
  </servlet-name>
  <url-pattern> 
   /ServletAlias
  </url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>
creator: gquach@logmetrix.com
cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
I can't reproduce it - /ServletAlias seems to work fine.
What doesn't work ( calling /servlet/ServletAlias ) is expected, as this 
is not part of the servlet spec. In general the invoker should be avoided,
 as it is not standard.
But I can't figure out why it works with Tomcat 3.1 and not with 3.2.1 ?
